models.name: todo_refresh_tokens
models.description: Stores refresh tokens for user authentication sessions. These tokens allow users to obtain new access tokens without re-entering credentials when the refresh token is still valid. The table supports the JWT-based authentication system by maintaining long-lived tokens that can be invalidated as needed.

plainFields.name: token
plainFields.description: The refresh token value as a secure string.

plainFields.name: expires_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this refresh token expires.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this refresh token was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when this refresh token was last updated.

models.name: todo_users
models.description: User accounts for the Todo application. This table stores the core identity and authentication information for users who interact with the system. Users are the primary actors in the application, responsible for creating and managing their tasks.

plainFields.name: email
plainFields.description: User's email address used for authentication and communication. Must be unique across the system.

plainFields.name: password_hash
plainFields.description: BCrypt hash of the user's password for secure authentication. Never store plain text passwords.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the user account was deleted (soft delete). NULL if account is active.

models.name: todo_user_profiles
models.description: User profile information for the Todo application. This table stores personal information about users that extends their basic account data. Profile data is subsidiary to the user account and is managed through the user entity.

plainFields.name: username
plainFields.description: Display name for the user. Unique across the system and used for personalization.

plainFields.name: full_name
plainFields.description: User's full name for display purposes.

plainFields.name: avatar_url
plainFields.description: URL to the user's avatar image.

plainFields.name: bio
plainFields.description: Short biography or description of the user.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the profile was created.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the profile was last updated.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the profile was deleted (soft delete). NULL if profile is active.

models.name: todo_tasks
models.description: Core entity representing a user's task in the Todo list application. This table stores all task-related information including title, status, and timestamps for audit purposes. Users can create, view, update, and delete their own tasks.

foreignFields.name: todo_user_id
foreignFields.description: User who owns this task. {@link todo_users.id}.

plainFields.name: title
plainFields.description: The task description or title entered by the user. Limited to 500 characters as per requirements.

plainFields.name: status
plainFields.description: Current status of the task. Possible values: 'pending', 'completed'. Tracks the task lifecycle.

plainFields.name: created_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the task was created. Used for sorting tasks chronologically and audit purposes.

plainFields.name: updated_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the task was last updated. Automatically updated on any modification for audit trail.

plainFields.name: deleted_at
plainFields.description: Timestamp when the task was deleted. Used for soft delete functionality and potential recovery.
